Package com.ultreon.craft.world

Class ServerWorld.Region

java.lang.Object
com.ultreon.craft.world.ServerWorld.Region
All Implemented Interfaces:
ServerDisposable
Enclosing class:
ServerWorld
@NotThreadSafe public static class ServerWorld.Region extends Object implements ServerDisposable
The region class. Note: This class is not thread safe.
Since:
0.1.0

      pos - the position of the region.

    • Region

      public Region(ServerWorld world, RegionPos pos, Map<ChunkPos,ServerChunk> chunks)
      Constructs a new region with the given world and position. It also preloads all chunks.
      Parameters:
      world - the world this region belongs to.
      pos - the position of the region.
      chunks - the chunks to load into the region.

      public RegionPos pos()
      Returns:
      the position of the region.

    • dispose

      @Internal public void dispose()
      Dispose the region, clearing up chunk data for the garbage collector to free up memory. Note: Internal API. Should only be called if you know what you are doing.
      Specified by:
      dispose in interface ServerDisposable

    • deactivate

      @Nullable public @Nullable Chunk deactivate(@NotNull @NotNull ChunkPos chunkPos)
      Deactivates the chunk at the given position. The chunk will still be loaded in memory for reuse.
      Parameters:
      chunkPos - the local position of the chunk to deactivate.
      Returns:
      the deactivated chunk, or null if the chunk wasn't loaded.

    • activate

      @Nullable @CanIgnoreReturnValue public @Nullable Chunk activate(@NotNull @NotNull ChunkPos chunkPos, ChunkPos globalPos)
      Activate the chunk at the given position.
      Parameters:
      chunkPos - the local position of the chunk to activate.
      globalPos - the global position of the chunk to activate.
      Returns:
      the acivated chunk, or null if the chunk wasn't loaded.

      Get a currently loaded chunk with the specified local position.
      Parameters:
      chunkPos - the position of the chunk to get.
      Returns:
      the chunk at that position, or null if the chunk wasn't loaded.

      Returns:

    • openChunk

      @Nullable public @Nullable ServerChunk openChunk(ChunkPos pos, ChunkPos globalPos)
      Opens a chunk at a specified position. If it isn't loaded yet, it will defer generating the chunk.
      Parameters:
      pos - the region local position of the chunk to open.
      globalPos - the global position.
      Returns:
      the loaded/generated chunk.

    • openChunkNow

      Parameters:

      globalPos - the global position.
